item.title: 罗技首席执行官表示，从中国转移生产已取得进展
item.description: 罗技国际首席执行官汉内克-法贝尔（Hanneke Faber）周三表示，将生产线迁出中国以应对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）关税影响的计划 "进展顺利"。【原文：Logitech International is "well on track" with plans to move production lines out of China to manage the impact of U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs, Chief Executive Hanneke Faber said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 墨西哥第二季度经济环比增长超预期
item.description: 墨西哥国家统计局（INEGI）周三的初步估计显示，墨西哥第二季度经济较前三个月增长了0.7%，高于市场预期。【原文：Mexico's economy grew 0.7% in the second quarter from the previous three-month period, a preliminary estimate from national statistics agency INEGI showed on Wednesday, beating market expectations.】

item.title: Zillow 被 CoStar 起诉侵犯版权
item.description: Zillow 周三遭到房地产信息提供商 CoStar Group 的起诉，后者指控这家美国最大的在线房地产门户网站未经许可发布了至少 46979 张受版权保护的照片。【原文：Zillow was sued on Wednesday by real estate information provider CoStar Group , which accused the largest U.S. online real estate portal of publishing at least 46,979 copyrighted photos without permission.】

item.title: 美联储召开会议，第二季度数据公布，特朗普力推降息
item.description: 在数据显示美国第二季度经济增长反弹幅度超过预期之后，唐纳德-特朗普总统周三再次呼吁美联储降低基准利率。【原文：President Donald Trump on Wednesday again called on the Federal Reserve to lower benchmark rates after data showed U.S. economic growth rebounded more than expected in the second quarter.】

item.title: 美国第二季度经济反弹
item.description: 美国第二季度经济增长的反弹幅度超过预期，但这严重夸大了经济的健康状况，因为进口的减少是经济增长的主要原因，而消费者支出的增长幅度也不大。【原文：U.S. economic growth rebounded more than expected in the second quarter, but that grossly overstated the economy's health as subsiding imports accounted for the bulk of the improvement and consumer spending increased moderately.】

item.title: Palo Alto 将以 250 亿美元收购 CyberArk，以应对人工智能时代的威胁
item.description: Palo Alto Networks 周三表示，它将以约 250 亿美元的价格收购以色列同行 CyberArk Software，从而在人工智能驱动的威胁不断增加的情况下，进一步推动其成为一家全面的网络安全服务提供商。【原文：Palo Alto Networks said on Wednesday it would buy Israeli peer CyberArk Software for about $25 billion, deepening its push to become a comprehensive provider of cybersecurity services amid rising AI-driven threats.】

item.title: 美国 7 月私营部门就业人数增加
item.description: 周三发布的《ADP全国就业报告》显示，尽管劳动力市场继续放缓，但7月份美国私营企业薪资增幅超过预期。【原文：U.S. private payrolls increased more than expected July, the ADP National Employment Report showed on Wednesday, though the labor market continues to slow.】

item.title: 由于尼古丁袋需求强劲，Altria 季度业绩超出预期
item.description: 烟草巨头阿尔特里亚公司（Altria）周三公布的第二季度收入和利润超出华尔街预期，这主要得益于对其尼古丁袋的强劲需求。【原文：Tobacco giant Altria beat Wall Street estimates for second-quarter revenue and profit on Wednesday, helped by strong demand for its on! nicotine pouches.】

item.title: 特朗普称美国将从 8 月 1 日起对印度征收 25% 的关税
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，美国将从8月1日起对从印度进口的商品征收25%的关税。【原文：President Donald Trump said the United States will impose a 25% tariff on goods imported from India starting on Aug. 1.】

item.title: 新兴市场复兴希望遭遇美元困境
item.description: 新兴市场正沉浸在今年令人惊喜的涨势中，但主要投资者警告说，随着各国最终了解美国关税的命运，以及美元走出低迷，情况可能会变得更加艰难。【原文：Emerging markets are basking in the glow of their surprise rally this year, but major investors warn things may get tougher as countries finally learn their U.S. tariff fates and the dollar snaps out of its slump.】

item.title: Helion Energy 开始建造核聚变工厂，为微软数据中心供电
item.description: Helion Energy 是一家由 OpenAI 的山姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）和软银风险投资部门支持的初创公司，该公司周三表示，计划中的核聚变发电厂已开始选址建设，到 2028 年将为微软数据中心供电。【原文：Helion Energy, a startup backed by OpenAI's Sam Altman and SoftBank's venture capital arm, has started construction on a site for a planned nuclear fusion power plant that will supply power to Microsoft data centers by 2028, the company said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 受 Miu Miu 品牌推动，Prada 上半年收入增长 9
item.description: 普拉达（Prada）周三报告称，按固定汇率计算，上半年净收入增长了 9%，逆转了行业疲软的趋势，这得益于其规模较小但扩张迅速的 Miu Miu 品牌，而其主要的同名品牌则落在后面。【原文：Prada , reported on Wednesday a 9% increase in first half net revenues at constant currencies, defying the weak sector trend thanks to its smaller but fast expanding Miu Miu brand, while its main eponymous label lagged behind.】

item.title: 云服务器初创企业 Oxide Computing 融资 1 亿美元
item.description: 云服务器制造商奥赛德计算机公司（Oxide Computer Company）周三表示，该公司已融资 1 亿美元，以帮助公司扩大生产能力，更快地推出新产品。【原文：Cloud server builder Oxide Computer Company on Wednesday said it has raised $100 million in financing to help the company expand its manufacturing capabilities and get new products out the door faster.】

item.title: 西班牙电信首席执行官称维珍媒体 O2 分拆基础设施的计划已取消
item.description: Telefonica 首席执行官马克-穆特拉（Marc Murtra）周三告诉路透社，分拆合资企业维珍媒体 O2 在英国的固定网络的计划已被取消。【原文：The plan to spin off joint venture Virgin Media O2's fixed network in Britain had been scrapped, Telefonica's Chief Executive Marc Murtra told Reuters on Wednesday.】

item.title: 需求强劲，Etsy 季度收入超出预期
item.description: Etsy 周三公布的第二季度营收超出华尔街预期，主要得益于在线市场对手工艺品和个性化礼品的强劲需求，该公司股价在盘前交易中上涨约 3%。【原文：Etsy beat Wall Street expectations for second-quarter revenue on Wednesday, helped by strong demand for handcrafted goods and personalized gifts sold at the online marketplace, sending the company's shares up about 3% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 意大利打造人工智能助手，帮助意大利人评估山体滑坡风险
item.description: 一家公共研究机构周三表示，意大利有超过一百万人生活在山体滑坡高风险或极高风险地区，而气候变化很可能导致更多的山体滑坡，该机构还宣布推出一款新的人工智能助手来帮助他们评估风险。【原文：More than a million people in Italy live in areas at high or very high risk of landslides and climate change is likely to lead to more of them, a public research body said on Wednesday, announcing a new AI assistant to help them assess the risk.】

item.title: 金融科技公司 Ramp 在后期融资中获得 225 亿美元估值
item.description: 金融科技公司 Ramp 周三表示，在投资公司 ICONIQ 领投的一轮后期融资中，该公司以 225 亿美元的估值筹集了 5 亿美元。【原文：Fintech Ramp said on Wednesday it had raised $500 million at a valuation of $22.5 billion in a late-stage funding round led by investment firm ICONIQ.】

item.title: 产品阵容强大，Garmin 上调 2025 年业绩预期
item.description: Garmin 公司周三上调了年度业绩预期，原因是其 GPS 健身设备和智能手表需求强劲。【原文：Garmin raised its annual results forecast on Wednesday, banking on strong demand for its GPS-enabled fitness devices and smartwatches.】

item.title: 特朗普称不会延长 8 月 1 日关税最后期限
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周三表示，他对其余贸易伙伴征收互惠关税的最后期限将不会在本周五延长。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Wednesday said his reciprocal tariff deadline for remaining trade partners will not be extended this Friday.】

item.title: 美国电力公司利润超预期，预计新五年资本计划达 700 亿美元
item.description: 美国电力公司周三公布的第二季度利润超出华尔街预期，并表示预计将在今年秋季宣布一项新的五年资本计划，投资约 700 亿美元，以满足美国日益增长的能源需求。【原文：American Electric Power beat Wall Street estimates for second-quarter profit on Wednesday, and said it expects to announce a new, five-year capital plan this fall of about $70 billion to meet growing energy needs in the U.S.】

item.title: 复活节需求强劲，好时业绩超出季度预期
item.description: 受复活节期间糖果和咸味零食需求的推动，好时周三公布的第二季度销售额和利润超出分析师预期。【原文：Hershey beat analysts' sales and profit estimates for the second quarter on Wednesday, driven by demand during Easter for its confectionery goods and salty snacks.】

item.title: KKR 与 Capital Group 合作推出混合公募与私募股权投资的基金
item.description: KKR 和 Capital Group 两家投资公司周三表示，随着投资者对传统资产以外的多元化投资需求的增加，它们将推出一只基金，让投资者同时接触私募股权和公募股权。【原文：KKR and Capital Group will launch a fund that will give investors exposure to both private and public equity, the investment firms said on Wednesday, as appetite rises for diversification beyond traditional assets.】

item.title: 帝亚吉欧任命 Deirdre Mahlan 为临时首席财务官
item.description: 帝亚吉欧周三表示，已任命迪尔德丽-马赫兰（Deirdre Mahlan）为临时财务总监，接替本月早些时候接任全球最大烈酒生产商临时首席执行官的尼克-詹贾尼（Nik Jhangiani）。【原文：Diageo said on Wednesday it has appointed Deirdre Mahlan as interim finance chief to succeed Nik Jhangiani who took over as interim CEO of the world's biggest spirits maker earlier this month.】

item.title: ADP 预测 2026 年收入增长低于预期
item.description: 自动数据处理公司（Automatic Data Processing）周三预测，2026 年全年收入增长略低于分析师预期，因为在经济不确定性持续存在的情况下，市场对其薪资和人力资本管理服务的需求有所减弱。【原文：Automatic Data Processing forecast full-year 2026 revenue growth slightly below analyst estimates on Wednesday, as demand for its payroll and human capital management services softened amid ongoing economic uncertainty.】

item.title: 官员称孟加拉国将从美国购买 22 万吨小麦以降低关税
item.description: 一位达卡官员周三表示，孟加拉国政府已批准从美国购买约22万吨小麦，作为缓解美国贸易紧张局势和降低特朗普政府征收的高额进口关税的努力的一部分。【原文：Bangladesh's government has approved the purchase of about 220,000 metric tons of wheat from the United States as part of efforts to cool U.S. trade tensions and reduce steep import tariffs imposed by the Trump administration, a Dhaka official said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国需求稳定，卡夫亨氏季度收入超预期
item.description: 卡夫亨氏（Kraft Heinz）周三公布的第二季度销售额降幅小于预期，这主要得益于美国消费者努力压缩家庭预算，对其冷冻肉类和即食餐的需求保持强劲。【原文：Kraft Heinz on Wednesday posted a smaller-than-expected drop in sales for the second quarter, helped by resilient demand for its frozen meat cuts and ready-to-eat meals in the United States as consumers tried to stretch their household budgets.】

item.title: 哈雷戴维森第二季度利润下降
item.description: 哈雷戴维森（Harley-Davidson）周三公布第二季度利润下降，并且没有提供年度预测，因为美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税继续对这家摩托车制造商造成压力。【原文：Harley-Davidson reported a lower second-quarter profit and did not provide an annual forecast on Wednesday, as U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs continued to weigh on the motorcycle maker.】

item.title: 美国 准备参加为期 3 天的障碍赛
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 中国太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）的竞争对手陆地空间公司（LandSpace）有意在上海上市
item.description: 据证券监管机构周二发布的一份文件显示，中国火箭开发商航天科技集团（LandSpace Technology）正寻求在上海证券交易所的科技股明星市场（STAR Market）上市。【原文：Chinese rocket developer LandSpace Technology is seeking to list on the Shanghai Stock Exchange's tech-focussed STAR Market, according to a document released by the securities regulator on Tuesday.】

item.title: 分析师称，如果特朗普加征关税，卢布疲软、石油上涨可能对俄罗斯有所帮助
item.description: 俄罗斯市场对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁实施新制裁反应谨慎，分析师周三表示，美国总统特朗普的措施导致卢布走软、油价上涨，短期内可能会对俄罗斯经济起到支撑作用。【原文：Russian markets reacted cautiously to U.S. President Donald Trump's threat to impose new sanctions, with analysts saying on Wednesday a weaker rouble and higher oil prices as a result of his measures may support the economy in the short term.】
